thread.title: In-demand Slavisa Jokanovic set to pen new two-year deal in huge boost to Fulham
thread.title_full: In-demand Slavisa Jokanovic set to pen new two-year deal in huge boost to Fulham

author: John Cross
title: In-demand Slavisa Jokanovic set to pen new two-year deal in huge boost to Fulham
text:
Slavisa Jokanovic is set to pen a new deal (Photo: Action Images via Reuters) Share   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Slavisa Jokanovic is ready to give Fulham a huge boost by signing a new two year contract. 
Fulham boss Jokanovic, 48, is close to agreeing a deal to stay at Craven Cottage until 2019 with the club set to announce it within the next couple of days. 
It is a huge boost for Fulham as former Watford boss Jokanovic has attracted interest from big foreign clubs, including Werder Bremen. 
But Jokanovic is clearly committed to Fulham after guiding the Championship club towards the play-offs and has also brought through a host of promising youngsters. Slavisa Jokanovic has Fulham on a good run of form (Photo: Rex) 
Jokanovic has been earning rave reviews for his style of play and looks ready to bring back some times to Craven Cottage. 
Fulham go to Bristol City tonight (WEDS) knowing they have tied down their manager which is a massive boost for the club. poll loading Will Fulham reach the play-offs? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
